title: Mathematics Instructional Design Process Using AI Chatbot Scaffolding Based on the 5E Model

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics education experience and grasp of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Learners interact with an AI chatbot via personal devices, while teachers provide formative assessment feedback. The focus is on strengthening instructional design competencies tailored to mathematics subject characteristics.

learning_goals: By applying the five phases of the 5E model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Extend-Evaluate), learners can systematically structure mathematics instructional design processes
Using AI chatbot scaffolding, learners can derive at least three instructional strategies (e.g., inquiry, modeling, problem-solving) suitable for mathematics classroom activities
By reflecting on formative assessment feedback, learners can revise and improve their instructional designs, and enhance final outputs through peer evaluation and comprehensive teacher assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
